title: Leadership Practice Competency Enhancement: Workshop on Improving Student-Centered Online Science Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three flaws in online science learning materials and propose improvements.
Learners can reconstruct existing learning materials by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can submit and share revised materials using digital tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
